description:
With the sudden passing of the Niigata representative Tonomura, his seat in the Diet is up for grabs. Clumsy country girl Hoshina Natsuki signs up for the position, running under the Heroine Party.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Même si je deviens une députée
Watashi ga Kokkaigiin ni Natte mo
私が国会議員になっても
